Articles.Content:
Hi all.

I build a science probe for minmus , I got it there however when I decided to deorbit and land the probe wouldn't hold still.

I selected retrograde but didn't initialize the engines or rcs. so no external forces.

its as if I had two probe cores and they were fighting for control, as if switching between which way is pro & retrograde.

 that's the best way I can describe it.

it happened to my kerbin polar satalite for scansat.

for that I thought kraken and left it at that. but now the next time I log on to play I get this one at minmus.

(I reckon Jeff musta uploaded a virus to my probcores and it spreading thou out my probe fleet, but wait Kerbals didn't attack on July 4th. :-/ )

 

anyway il put a modlist below, however there aint errors so I dunno what else to do. (F3)
